features.title: The Program
features.description: We've created a system conatining a variety of diciplines you can explore, experience journaling, and a creative unlock system designed to engage and motivate.

features.title: The Community
features.description: You have the optional ability to connect, share, build relationships, guide and grow with a community of like-minded individuals on the app and in real-life.

features.title: The Events
features.description: Real-life and online events bring you deeper and tangible experiences, our 'Intro to Everything' event is designed to demystify multiple modalities in a relaxed setting.

testimonials.name: ABOUT
testimonials.description: Connecting with Yourself and Everything Around You
testimonials.designation: We're a small team focused on connecting people with themselves and with all. The idea came out of the difficulty to find a consistent meditation routine.

testimonials.name: MISSION
testimonials.designation: Growth in an overall positive direction is the nature of the universe.

testimonials.name: AUTHENTICITY

testimonials.name: GRATITUDE
testimonials.designation: We're thankful for our collaborators and supporters for their knowledge, ideas and big hearts who helped to bring to light something meaningful and we're looking for others to help lend a hand. Thank you.

testimonials.name: SUPPORT
testimonials.description: Please Consider Supporting Us on Patreon
testimonials.designation: We're a small and scrappy startup with big vision, any support in any way would be invaluable.
